trans-unit.source: Specifies and configures the services that are to be active in the domain which is entered when calling <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceDomain.Enter*> or creating an <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Activity"></xref>.
This class cannot be inherited.

<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceDomain.Enter%2A> and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.%23ctor%2A> allow you to use the services configured by ServiceConfig with no need to tie those services to a component.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"></xref> class, setting the properties to configure the desired services.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>.

|Item|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`Binding`|<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BindingOption>| |`BringYourOwnTransaction`|`null`| |`COMTIIntrinsicsEnabled`|`false`| |`IISIntrinsicsEnabled`|`false`| |`Inheritance`|<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption>| |`IsolationLevel`|<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionIsolationLevel>| |`PartitionId`|A zero GUID.| |`PartitionOption`|<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.PartitionOption>| |`SxsDirectory`|`null`| |`SxsName`|`null`| |`SxsOption`|<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption>| |`Synchronization`|<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption>| |`ThreadPool`|<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ThreadPoolOption>| |`TipUrl`|`null`| |`TrackingAppName`|`null`| |`TrackingComponentName`|`null`| |`TrackingEnabled`|`false`| |`Transaction`|<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption>| |`TransactionDescription`|`null`| |`TransactionTimeout`|The system default|
<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"></xref> is not supported on the current platform.
Gets or sets the binding option, which indicates whether all work submitted by the activity is to be bound to only one single-threaded apartment (STA).
Binding has no impact on the multithreaded apartment (MTA).
This property is used to set the thread pool binding only when creating a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity>.
An error is returned if an attempt is made to set the thread pool binding when calling <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceDomain.Enter%2A>.
One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.BindingOption"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.BindingOption"></xref>.

Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref> that represents an existing transaction that supplies the settings used to run the transaction identified by <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"></xref>.
BringYourOwnSystemTransaction (BYOT) identifies a transaction that supplies the context for the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> transaction.
When you bring your own transaction, that transaction's settings override the other transaction settings in the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> object.
The default value for <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.BringYourOwnTransaction%2A> is `null`.
For more information on BYOT, see <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT>.
A <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

Gets or sets a <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction"></xref> that represents an existing transaction that supplies the settings used to run the transaction identified by <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"></xref>.
BringYourOwnTransaction (BYOT) identifies a transaction that supplies the context for the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> transaction.
When you bring your own transaction, that transaction's settings override the other transaction settings in the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> object.
The default value for BringYourOwnTransaction is `null`.
For more information on BYOT, see <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT>.
An <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction"></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) intrinsics are enabled.
Enables passing context properties from the COMTI into the context for this class.
The COMTI eases the task of wrapping mainframe transactions and business logic as COM components.
Configures the COMTI intrinsics for the work that is done.
The COMTI eases the task of wrapping mainframe transactions and business logic with transactions.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if COMTI intrinsics are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Internet Information Services (IIS) intrinsics are enabled.
Enables passing IIS context properties, such as an application session object or a user session object, into the context for this class.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if IIS intrinsics are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to construct a new context based on the current context or to create a new context based solely on the information in <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"></xref>.
One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption"></xref>.
Gets or sets the isolation level of the transaction.
A new transaction is created if the enclosing transaction is not running at the specified isolation level.
IsolationLevel is ignored if the enclosed code would not otherwise run in a transaction.
One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionIsolationLevel"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionIsolationLevel"></xref>.
Gets or sets the GUID for the COM+ partition that is to be used.
The GUID for the partition to be used.
The default is a zero GUID.
Gets or sets a value that indicates how partitions are used for the enclosed work.
One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.PartitionOption"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.PartitionOption"></xref>.
Gets or sets the directory for the side-by-side assembly for the enclosed work.
Configures side-by-side assemblies for this <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>.

You must set the SxsDirectory property, if you create a new side-by-side assembly by setting the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.SxsOption%2A> property to <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption>.
The name of the directory to be used for the side-by-side assembly.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the file name of the side-by-side assembly for the enclosed work.
The file name of the side-by-side assembly.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates how to configure the side-by-side assembly.
One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value in that indicates the type of automatic synchronization requested by the component.
One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates the thread pool which runs the work submitted by the activity.
One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ThreadPoolOption"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ThreadPoolOption"></xref>.
Gets or sets the Transaction Internet Protocol (TIP) URL that allows the enclosed code to run in an existing transaction.

TipUrl is similar to the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.BringYourOwnTransaction%2A> property but allows the enclosed code to run as an existing transaction that is specified by a TIP URL.
A TIP URL.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a text string that corresponds to the application ID under which tracker information is reported.
Because no component is associated with this tracker property, tracker activity is reported as arising from a component with the name specified by TrackingAppName.
For more information, see <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.TrackingEnabled%2A>.
The application ID under which tracker information is reported.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a text string that corresponds to the context name under which tracker information is reported.
The context name under which tracker information is reported.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether tracking is enabled.
The tracker is a reporting mechanism used by monitoring applications to watch running COM+ components.
It is the reporting mechanism behind the spinning component icons in the Component Services administrative tool.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if tracking is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates how transactions are used in the enclosed work.
One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption"></xref>.
Gets or sets the name that is used when transaction statistics are displayed.
If a description if not provided, the value of <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.TrackingComponentName%2A> is used to describe the transaction.
The name used when transaction statistics are displayed.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the transaction time-out for a new transaction.
The transaction time-out, in seconds.
